_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The reasons for feeling drugged, disorie: Not pursuing the development of the qualities that lead to awakening in the evening and toward dawn
The training to overcome the feeling of: Pursuing the development of the qualities that lead to awakening in the evening and toward dawn
